subject: Order cancellation request
description_text:
Please cancel my order:

Order Number: SSN3629

麻烦取消这个订单 我不知道这个control box包括在我定的踏板里面

Thanks,
Ian

conversations.body_text: Hi Ian Li,    We apologize for not responding to you promptly. Your order has already been shipped, and we are unable to cancel it for you. We sincerely apologize.

I would like to return it then, could you provide me a return shipping
label or?

On Sun, Nov 23, 2025, 10:01 PM service@simsonn.com
